examples.korean: He made out that he had been robbed. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 강도를 당했다고 주장했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He made out that he had been robbed. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He did six years for armed robbery. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 무장 강도 혐의로 6년을 복역했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He did six years for armed robbery. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The robbery appeared to have been an inside job. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 강도 행위는 내부자의 소행으로 보였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The robbery appeared to have been an inside job. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: There have been several muggings here recently. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이곳에서 최근에 몇 건의 강도 사건이 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
